meanings.definition: To taste again, especially to evaluate the flavor of something previously tasted.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, she decided to retasting the delicious dessert to see if it was as good as she remembered.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy retasting different wines to understand their unique flavors better.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally retasting the spicy sauce and made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Retasting the memories of childhood is like savoring a sweet treat from the past.
meanings.sent5: Retasting the soup brought back memories of family gatherings and laughter.

meanings.definition: The act of tasting something again, often to compare it to a previous tasting.
meanings.sent1: His retasting of the coffee revealed subtle differences in flavor from the morning batch.
meanings.sent2: The retasting of the cake was necessary to determine if it had gone stale.
meanings.sent3: The retasting of the ice cream cone led to a playful debate about the best flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her retasting of the tea sparked a discussion about the art of brewing.
meanings.sent5: The retasting of the cookies brought back memories of baking with grandma.
